name: finder-favorites
title: Finder Favorites
description: Have quick access to your finder folders through raycast
author: enricomilli

commands.name: folder-0
commands.title: Downloads
commands.description: See your favorite folders from finder

commands.name: folder-1
commands.title: Documents
commands.description: See your favorite folders from finder

commands.name: folder-2
commands.title: Developer
commands.description: See your favorite folders from finder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
